string.value: #b#p9120003##k, a proud resident of #b#m800000000##k, seems to be annoyed by something.

#p9120003# was indeed annoyed by something. She was disturbed that the #t4000222#s that are being used at #m800000000# is apparently stuck with ghosts. This isn't annoying; this is downright creepy. I better kill #b100 #o9400011#s#k and get her some #b#t4000222#s#k, just the way #p9120003# said.

#o9400011# #r#a43061##k 
#t4000222# #b#c4000222#/50
I eliminated #o9400011# and got some #t4000222#s for use. The more I think about it, I think #o9400011# is much more of a dangerous presence than an unlit street at night.
Oh no. This isn't good. Hey, there. If you aren't really busy, then can you help me out? There's not much to worry. It may take up a little of your time, but it's nothing big.

I appreciate that. We have been experiencing problems with the lanterns in the streets lately. I mean, the #t4000222#s got stuck with ghosts! What? No no, there's nothing to worry. It's really nothing. Just go ahead and kill #b100 #o9400011#s#k, and I also want you to gather up #b50 #t4000222#s#k to be used at various places in this town. See, it's pretty simple!
Really? I am sure you have your own issues to deal with. Where am I going to find #t4000222#, then?
Hmmm, okay. I guess you killed some #o9400011#s. What do you think? That wasn't too difficult, was it?

Great work there. It's really dangerous at night here without the #t4000222#s brightening up the streets. It's to make sure no one gets hurt walking in the dark. That's why we really needed these #t4000222#s. Thank you.
You haven't finished yet, right? Please go ahead and kill #b100 #o9400011#s#k and gather up #b50 #t4000222#s#k in the process.
You haven't finished yet, right? Please go ahead and kill #b100 #o9400011#s#k and gather up #b50 #t4000222#s#k in the process.
